title: Keboola - Google Maps Reviews Scraper
description: Provide your Apify API Token to connect the component with Apify platform. Additionally you can provide parameters like desired number of reviews per place, language, or sort. See the configuration description above how to pass Google place URLs or IDs to the component.

#token.title: Apify API Token
#token.description: Enter your Apify API Token to start the actor. See the configuration description how to obtain the token.

maxReviews.title: Number of reviews
maxReviews.description: Max number of reviews per place to scrape. If you fill in 0 or nothing, no reviews will be scraped. For all reviews, just put 99999.

reviewsSort.title: Sort reviews by
reviewsSort.description: Define how reviews should be sorted.

reviewsStartDate.title: Only scrape reviews newer than [date]
reviewsStartDate.description: Enter either an absolute date in YYYY-MM-DD or ISO format, (e.g. 2022-02-20 or 2024-05-03T10:00:00) or relative date with number and time unit (e.g. 8 days or 3 months).

language.title: Language
language.description: Results details will show in this language.

reviewsOrigin.title: Reviews origin
reviewsOrigin.description: Select whether you want all reviews (from Google, Tripadvisor, etc.) or only reviews from Google

personalData.title: Personal data
personalData.description: This settings allows you to obtain personal data about reviewer (his ID, name, URL and his photo URL) and about review (ID and URL). Personal data is protected by the GDPR in the European Union and by other regulations around the world. You should not scrape personal data unless you have a legitimate reason to do so. If you're unsure whether your reason is legitimate, consult your lawyers.

incrementalOutput.title: Incremental Loading
incrementalOutput.description: If checked the component loads data incrementally otherwise all data from the component will be loaded.
